\item

\begingl[glneveryline={\EnglishGlossA,\EnglishGlossB}]
If[] any[] bhikkhu,[] having[] approached[] the[] bhikkhunī-quarters,[] should[] exhort[] the[] bhikkhunīs,[] except[] at[] the[] (right)[] occasion,[] (this[] is[] a[] case)[] involving[] expiation.[]
\endgl
